Title: Banana Cake
Ingredients: shortening - sugar - eggs - salt - milk - soda water - flour
Directions: Put 2 cups of shortening in a bowl with 1 1/2 cups of sugar. 1 1/2 cups of sugar. 2 eggs. pinch of salt. 2 cups of milk. 1 tsp soda water. 1 3/4 cups flour. 1 1/2 tsp baking powder. 2 cups of chopped nuts. Mix all ingredients till smooth and bake in three layering pans at 350 degrees fahrenheit for 1 hour.
